name: 1-800-Pharmacy

overview:
1-800-Pharmacy is a new online pharmacy that has partnered with Kroger, IPC, and Childrenâ€™s Miracle Network to help customers â€œSave Timeâ€¦Save Moneyâ€¦Save Livesâ€.

Instead of spending money on traditional advertising, 1-800-Pharmacy takes the advertising budget on every product and gives 50% of it back to the customer as Ad Rebates, 40% to the people that referred that customer, and 10% to the customerâ€™s local Childrenâ€™s Miracle Network hospital.

Customers earn Ad Rebates on 1-800-Pharmacyâ€™s non-prescription health & beauty products, as well as on products at its Rebate Mall, which includes retailers such as Macyâ€™s, Borders, and Office Depot.

1-800-Pharmacy gives one life-saving product to a child every time a similar one is purchased. This allows customers to: > vaccinate a child when they fill their prescription > give an essential nutrient to a child when they purchase a wellness product > give a pair of shoes to a child when they purchase a pair > feed a child when they purchase a home medical product
